questions.quote: Hey. Hey. Hey. Hey. Hey. Hey. Hey. Wha -- what are you doing?

Ohhh, OK, fine, fine, go ahead. But listen let me tell you something as soon as I get there I'm going to tell everyone what a jerk you are.
